Package springapplication.rest

Class RestaurantResource

java.lang.Object
springapplication.rest.RestaurantResource
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="api/v1/restaurant", consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") public class RestaurantResource extends Object

    Description

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Restaurant>>
    getRestaurants(int stars, int priceRange, boolean currentlyOpen, Speciality speciality)
    Returns all the restaurants we have in the DB if no filters are applied Otherwise all the filters that are set will be used Returns a List of restaurants that match the filter (Stars, PriceRange, CurrentlyOpen, Speciality) This function can be used to search for a specific restaurant and get its reservation etc.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Restaurant>>
    getRestaurantsByLimit(int limit)
    Returns the restaurants we have in the DB but at must {limit}
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Restaurant>
    getRestaurantsByName(String restaurantName)
    Returns a Restaurant with a given name if it exits otherwise empty

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • RestaurantResource

      @Autowired public RestaurantResource(RestaurantService restaurantService)

  • Method Details

    • getRestaurants

      @GetMapping(consumes="*/*") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Restaurant>> getRestaurants(@RequestParam(required=false,name="stars",defaultValue="-1") int stars, @RequestParam(required=false,name="priceRange",defaultValue="-1") int priceRange, @RequestParam(required=false,name="currentlyOpen",defaultValue="false") boolean currentlyOpen, @RequestParam(required=false,name="speciality",defaultValue="Unbekannt") Speciality speciality)
      Returns all the restaurants we have in the DB if no filters are applied Otherwise all the filters that are set will be used Returns a List of restaurants that match the filter (Stars, PriceRange, CurrentlyOpen, Speciality) This function can be used to search for a specific restaurant and get its reservation etc. If no filters are set we return all restaurants

    • getRestaurantsByLimit

      @GetMapping("limit/{limit}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Restaurant>> getRestaurantsByLimit(@PathVariable("limit") int limit)
      Returns the restaurants we have in the DB but at must {limit}

    • getRestaurantsByName

      @GetMapping("{restaurantName}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Restaurant> getRestaurantsByName(@PathVariable("restaurantName") String restaurantName)
      Returns a Restaurant with a given name if it exits otherwise empty
